data.name: Phoenix
data.description: Jean Grey absorbs her enemies negative status effects, being reborn as Dark Phoenix if she falls in battle.

starItems.name: Phoenix
starItems.description: Jean Grey absorbs her enemies negative status effects, being reborn as Dark Phoenix if she falls in battle.

2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>250</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>500</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>750</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>2,500</color> Healing
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>4,000</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>6,000</color> Healing
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>10,000</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.
6.nextUpgrade: If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + spread all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from this character to the primary target

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all allies.

Heal all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies for <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute <color=#86e619>25%</color> of Max Health from self to all allies. All allies receive an additional <color=#86e619>10,000</color> Health. This bypasses <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

Transfer all negative effects from allies to self.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + spread all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color> and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, from this character to the primary target.

If this character has no allies, attack self for <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Piercing.
If this character dies, their Passive Ability will trigger.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>50,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear all positive effects from primary target
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from all other allies

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + clear all positive effects.

Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from all other allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description:
On Death, summon Dark Phoenix.
Phoenix cannot be revived.

On ally <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Death, summon Dark Phoenix.
Phoenix cannot be revived.

On ally <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage

3.description:
On Death, summon Dark Phoenix.
Phoenix cannot be revived.

On ally <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade: On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

On Death, summon Dark Phoenix.
Phoenix cannot be revived.

On ally <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

On Death, summon Dark Phoenix.
Phoenix cannot be revived.

On ally <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
